name: Lockpicker Joe
description:
A game made in 4 days for My First Game Jam: Winter 2021. It's a short puzzle game with 18 levels with few gimmicks.

Music:
music and sfx by MusMus https://musmus.main.jp/
Scenic Ride by Noisysundae
Assets:
Tilesets made by Tilation 
https://opengameart.org/users/armisius
Character sprites made by AlexDer 
https://alexder.itch.io/
